p.p: THIS APPLICATION ALLOWS RECORDING DETAILS FOR BANKS OF PLACEMENT USED IN THE FIDUCIARY SYSTEM.
IT IS NAMELY USED TO SPECIFY A SPECIFIC INTEREST CALCULATION METHOD FOR A GIVEN BANK.

desc.p: Specifies the currency of the sub value set
3-alpha character SWIFT standard currency code
No duplicate currencies allowed is a specific value, means that the following field is defined for all currency
Must exist on the CURRENCY file.
The key of this field must be a valid bank number
1 6 numeric customer number or 3 10 alphanumeric customer mnemonic
(mandatory input)
Must exist on the CUSTOMER file
Must be a bank

t.desc:
Specifies the default interest calculation method for the bank defined in the key
Validation Rules:
Input must be defined in INTEREST.BASIS
1 alpha character may be entered
mandatory input.
The following values are permitted :
A(360/360)
B(366/360)
E(366/365)
F(360/365)

desc.p: Type or Subtype for which the interest calculation method is defined.
A maximum of 6 characters may be entered
No duplicate is allowed
Blank value is allowed
Input must be defined in field FID.TYPE or FID.SUBTYPE of FD.PARAMETER
The different elements of the list are taken from the current values defined in FD.PARAMETER
The following values which are permitted can be :
FIXED
NOTICE
IN
OUT
CD
